article: Pearson has _ together to work of hundreds of researchers around the world to produce a _ millennium technology calendar that gives the latest dates when we can expect hundreds of key _ and discoveries to take place. But that, Pearson points _ , is only the start of man-machine _ :"It will be the beginning of the long process of integration that will _ lead to a fully electronic human before the end of the next century." _ his research, Pearson is able to put dates to most of the breakthroughs that can be predicted. But he does _ social problems as a result of technological advances.
